item.title: On tour with the National Youth Choir
item.author: Daniel Marx,
item.description: I spent the first two-and-a-half weeks of August singing. Well, not constantly, but almost. Now, this was not just a very long rave, although I certainly did have a lot of fun. No, this was perfectionist music making with the National Youth Choir (‘NYC’ amongst friends) where singing a note with the …
